rukus.text: 17|101|Ara amara musake nayati spasta nidarsana diyechilama [1]; sutaram apani bani isara'ilake jijnesa kare dekhuna; yakhana tini tadera kache esechilena, atahpara phira’a'una tamke balechila, ‘he musa! Ami mane kari niscaya tumi jadugrasta.’

17|102|Musa balalena, tumi abasya'i jana [1] ye, e saba spasta nidarsana asamanasamuha o yaminera raba'i nayila karechena---pratyaksa pramanasbarupa. Ara he phira’a'una! Ami to mane karachi tumi habe dhbansaprapta.
17|103|Atahpara phira’a'una taderake desa theke uccheda karara iccha karala; takhana amara tamke o tamra sangidera saba'ike nimajjita karalama [1].
17|104|Ara amara erapara bani isara'ilake balalama, ‘takhana yamine basabasa kara ebam yakhana akhiratera pratisruti bastabayita habe takhana tomadera saba'ike amara ekatra kare upasthira karaba
17|105|ara amara satya-saha'i kura'ana nayila karechi ebam ta satya-saha'i nayila hayeche [1]. Ara amara to apanake sudhu susambadadata o satarkakarirupe pathiyechi.
17|106|Ara amara kura'ana nayila karechi khanda khandabhabe yate apani ta manusera kache patha karate parena krame krame ebam amara ta paryayakrame nayila karechi [1].
17|107|Baluna, ‘tomara kura'ane imana ana ara na'i imana ana, niscaya yaderake era age jnana deya hayeche, tadera kache yakhana eta tela'o'ata kara haya takhana'i tara sajadaya lutiye pare.’
17|108|Ara tara bale, ‘amadera raba pabitra, mahana. Amadera rabera pratisruti karyakara haye'i thake.’
17|109|‘Ara tara kamdate kamdate natamastake lutiye pare ebam eta tadera binaya brd'dhi kare.’

17|110|Baluna, ‘tomara ‘allah’ name daka ba ‘rahamana’ name daka, tomara ye name'i daka sakala sundara nama'i to tamra. Ara apani salate sbara khuba ucca karabena na abara khuba ksina'o karabena na; baram e duyera madhyapatha abalambana karuna [1].

17|111|Baluna, ‘prasansa allahara'i yini kono santana grahana karenani [1], tamra sarbabhaumatbe kono ansidara ne'i [2] ebam durdasagrastata theke bamcate tamra abhibhabakera prayojana ne'i [3]. Ara apani sasambhrame tamra mahatmya ghosana karuna.
